acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should correctly handle generic collections in constructor with memoization enabled
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleGenericCollectionsInConstructorWithMemoizationEnabled

test-group.name: Given a Standard Podam Factory with memoization enabled

test-step.description: Given a Random Data Provider Strategy with memoization set to true
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.issue123.GenericCollectionsConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type 847047822019722
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type LXO35SnCbR
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type 1880158417
